sentences.en: "I've come to reclaim my property," she announced to the desk clerk.
sentences.cn: “我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentences.en: a clerk in a commercial firm
A clerk simply verifies that the payment and invoice amount match.
sentences.cn: 职员只是核实付款和发票上的数额是否一致。

sentences.en: He overworks and underpays the poor clerk whom he employs.
sentences.cn: 他让那个可怜的职员超负荷工作，却只支付极低的薪水。

sentences.en: He serves as a clerk in a bank.
sentences.cn: 他在一家银行当办事员.

sentences.en: He was promoted from a clerk to a manager.
He's nothing better than a jumped-up bank clerk!
sentences.cn: 他只不过是个自以为了不起的银行职员罢了！

sentences.en: I've never seen such a polite clerk.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过这样有礼貌的店员.

sentences.en: It was strange, how invisible a clerk could feel.
sentences.cn: 一名办事员会感到如此受人忽视，令人觉得不可思议。

sentences.en: John was promoted [ advanced ] from a clerk to a manager.
sentences.cn: 约翰由职员 晋升 为经理.

sentences.en: Leave the keys with the desk clerk .
sentences.cn: 把钥匙交给柜台服务员。

sentences.en: The clerk asked me to sign the docket.
sentences.cn: 店员让我在单据上签字。

sentences.en: the clerk in the shoe store
The clerk regarded him with benevolent amusement.
sentences.cn: 这个职员好心而又饶有兴趣地看着他。

sentences.en: The clerk was elevated to a managerial position.
sentences.cn: 那个职员被提升到经理职位.

sentences.en: The clerk was given a promotion and an increase in salary.
sentences.cn: 那个职员升了级,加了薪.

sentences.en: The sales clerk parceled his purchase.
sentences.cn: 售货员把他买的东西打成包裹.
